solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean isSubsequence(String s, String t) {--newline--        if (s.length() == 0) return true;--newline--        int indexS = 0, indexT = 0;--newline--        while (indexT < t.length()) {--newline--            if (t.charAt(indexT) == s.charAt(indexS)) {--newline--                indexS++;--newline--                if (indexS == s.length()) return true;--newline--            }--newline--            indexT++;--newline--        }--newline--        return false;--newline--    }--newline--}
